forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
This morning, Downtown San Francisco greets you with a gentle whisper of lingering fog and serene clarity. The high of 57 balances beautifully against the coolness of the Northwest breezes, which caress the skin like a soft sigh. As the sun rises higher, it gifts the day with a golden touch; patches of blue peek through the clouds, while wisps of fog skirt delicately along the edges of the Golden Gate, accentuating the city’s iconic silhouette.

As the afternoon unfolds, temperatures will gradually descend, revealing a comfortable layer of coolness. Tonight, the skies will settle into a partly cloudy lull, with the evening air softly kissed by a westerly breeze at around 6 mph. For those venturing out, a light jacket will serve well against the chill, particularly if you plan to stroll along the waterfront or enjoy an outdoor café. Given the temperate weather, consider a visit to local art galleries or the warm allure of a cozy bookstore, where the world outside fades and quietude reigns. Such pursuits will harmonize beautifully with the day’s conditions, crafting a gentle narrative for your afternoon in the city.
